\n
POSITION OVERVIEW
\n
The Program Data Specialist is responsible for collection, management and reporting of programmatic data across multiple programs. This role involves data entry, validation, and reporting across internal and external databases where program data are housed and reported for internal stakeholder and funders. This position acts as the program data subject matter expert and works alongside the Data Analyst/Manager to develop dashboards, reports, and other analytics that highlight the impact of our programs.
\n
Essential Functions
\n
Program Data
\n
\n
Maintains internal and external client databases and reconciles any variances.
\n
Pulls data reports from internal and external data sources for data reporting and KPI measures.
\n
Audits client data for accuracy and makes necessary corrections.
\n
Maintains programmatic output and outcomes reports.
\n
Creates and maintains program dashboards.
\n
\n
Compliance & Program Integrity
\n
\n
Ensures compliance with all program contracts, grant requirements, and funding guidelines as it pertains
\n
\n
to client data management.
\n
\n
Works with support services to ensure funder reports and billing reports are completed on time and
\n
\n
accurately.
\n
Program Area Support & Collaboration
\n
\n
Assists the Data Analyst/Manager in the creation of dashboards, and other data analysis tools that help
\n
\n
inform program leaders and tell the story of the program impact.
\n
\n
Attends and serves as a contributing member to the Data Community of Practice group.
\n
Works with management to prioritize business and information needs.
\n
Collaborates with end users and team members to identify opportunities for improvement.
\n
Professionally represents the Agency to outside stakeholders and funders.
\n
\n
\n

\n
\n
Performs other duties as assigned
\n
Complies with all policies and standards
